Name: Capt. Injustice
Text: Commander, are you sure your Lieutenant can handle himself out there?

Name: Christa
Text: Absolutely, Sir! I trained the heck out of him for this. He worked hard to be in this team.

Name: Capt. Injustice
Text: To be honest he looks weak. But since you're the legendary Christa Baron, I'll take your word for it.
